## Dietary Score

Julie and Morten have been working on a dietary score for Julies project on nutrition among cancer survivors (2024/2025).

Julie writes (apr2025):

Den score vi har lavet er en adapteret version af en score til kræftforebyggelse – se de to første referencer. Denne score er måske også relevant for CVD – se den sidste ref.

\
[Operationalizing the 2018 World Cancer Research Fund/American Institute for Cancer Research (WCRF/AICR) Cancer Prevention Recommendations: A Standardized Scoring System - PubMed](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31336836/)

[Further Guidance in Implementing the Standardized 2018 World Cancer Research Fund/American Institute for Cancer Research (WCRF/AICR) Score - PubMed](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32152215/)

[The 2018 World Cancer Research Fund/American Institute for Cancer Research (WCRF/AICR) Score and All-Cause, Cancer, and Cardiovascular Disease Mortality Risk: A Longitudinal Analysis in the NIH-AARP Diet and Health Study - PubMed](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/35755938/)
